title: Why cant i buy elementalist lux
body: I am happy and really excited for the new ultimate skin. I was just wondering when I can buy it

replies.body: @moobeat said German LoL FB says that Elementalist Lux will be released on 28th (Monday)  https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsDE/ … // https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsDE/videos/1125380264243902/ …

Her skin is not available at the moment, but if you sit tight, we should be able to purchase this skin in the near future. I can't provide an ETA, but please let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XU7upfdk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-28T00:44:12.029+0000)
>
> Her skin is not available at the moment, but if you sit tight, we should be able to purchase this skin in the near future. I can't provide an ETA, but please let me know if you have any other questions.

you cant provide ETA? it was announced for 28th! and still not in the store... you guys are a serious corp or a kindergarten ?
